Pre-Game Insights: Jos Buttler backed England to learn from their 50-over World Cup disappointment and perform better in the T20 World Cup.
England's problem was attributed to not playing well enough rather than a lack of clarity from the team management.
Experience combined with young talent is expected to push the team forward, citing Phil Salt as an example.
Kieron Pollard has been enlisted as a batting consultant for the campaign.
Conditions in the West Indies can be slow with spin playing a big part, and early morning starts are expected due to daylight saving changes.
